question: Who is the first Deputy Chief for Military Operations and Strategic Planning in the Army?
explanation: The Defence Ministry has approved the creation of a new post in the Army- Deputy Chief for Military Operations and Strategic Planning. The Deputy Chief will deal with strategic planning, military operations, intelligence and operational logistics. This is the 3<sup>rd</sup> post of deputy chief in the Army. Lt Gen Paramjit Singh is to be come the first Deputy Chief of Army of Staff.
